sen.j: 三野浪魚（みののなみうお)は奈良時代の人。
sen.e: MINO no Namiuo was a person of Nara period.
MINO no Namiuo was a person of the Nara period.
MINO no Namiuo was a person of the Nara period.
He was a government official of Tsudaka County, Bizen Province.
He was a government official of Tsudaka County, Bizen Province.
He was a government official of Tsudaka County, Bizen Province.

sen.j: 津高郡の少領になり、宝亀7年12月当時外従五位下だったという。
sen.e: He became Shoryo (assistant director of Gunji: a district manager) of Tsudaka County, and he was ranked Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) of gei (Court rank for local ruling family in the region and a local official) as of January 777.
sen.cmt: 外（外位）について用語検索では "gei (Ikai, Court rank for Gozoku, local ruling family in the region and chihokan, a local officials)" となっていますが、一部省略し訳文のようにしました。
sen.e: He became Shoryo (assistant director of Gunji: a district manager) of Tsudaka County, and he was ranked Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) of gei (Court rank for local ruling family in the region and a local official) as of January 777.

He became Shoryo (assistant director of Gunji: a district manager) of Tsudaka County, and he was ranked Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) of gei (Court rank for local ruling family in the region and a local official) as of January 777.
